title: Will Assassin's Creed Shadows Be Good?
description:
Assassin's Creed Shadows continues to be the biggest question mark of 2025. 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YqcKjHYufXI&pp=ygUJZ2FtZXNjYXN0
